body_html:
the formula looks slightly off indeed. But on an eps of 1e-8, i doubt it'd make a difference at float precision limits.

I'm hesitant to correct it because i dont want to introduce changed behavior downstream in user-code. Let me know if my reasoning doesn't satisfy you.

body:
the formula looks slightly off indeed. But on an eps of 1e-8, i doubt it'd make a difference at float precision limits.

I'm hesitant to correct it because i dont want to introduce changed behavior downstream in user-code. Let me know if my reasoning doesn't satisfy you.
